data.name: textBox5.Value
data.value:
= IIF(Fields.DesignationName = "", "", Fields.DesignationName + ", ") + Fields.DepartmentName + " " + IIF(Fields.Address1 = "", "", Fields.Address1) + "
" + IIF(Fields.Address2 = "", "", "Res. Addr.: " + Fields.Address2) + " Mob.: " + Fields.Mobile1

data.name: sdsMain.SelectCommand
data.value: SELECT DISTINCT Appointment.StaffId, Staff.Salutation, Staff.Name AS StaffName, Appointment.CollegeId, dbo.GetCollegeName(Appointment.CollegeId) AS CollegeName, Appointment.CoursePartId, Schedule.MeetingDate, Appointment.SubjectId, Subject.Name AS SubjectName, Appointment.IsInternal, College.Address1 AS CollegeAddress, Staff.Address1, Staff.Phone1, Staff.Mobile1, Staff.Address2, Appointment.IsChairman, Schedule.OutwardNo, dbo.GetCourseName(Appointment.CourseId) AS CourseName, dbo.GetCoursePartName(Appointment.CoursePartId) AS CoursePartName, ISNULL(dbo.GetBranchName(Appointment.BranchId), N'') AS BranchName, Appointment.InstanceId, Subject.StandardSets, Subject.SubjectType, Subject.BalanceSets, Appointment.IsPaperSetter, Instance.Name AS InstanceName, Instance.StartDate, Instance.EndDate, ISNULL(dbo.GetDesignationName(Staff.DesignationId), N'') AS DesignationName, ISNULL(dbo.GetDepartmentName(Staff.DepartmentId), N'') AS DepartmentName, dbo.GetSetsToBeDrawn(Appointment.InstanceId, Appointment.FacultyId, Appointment.CollegeId, Appointment.CourseId, Appointment.CoursePartId, Appointment.SubjectId) AS SetsToBeDrawn, dbo.GetLetterAddress(Appointment.CourseId) AS LetterAddress FROM Appointment INNER JOIN College ON Appointment.CollegeId = College.Id INNER JOIN Instance ON Appointment.InstanceId = Instance.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN Subject ON Appointment.SubjectId = Subject.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN Staff ON Appointment.StaffId = Staff.Id INNER JOIN Schedule ON Appointment.InstanceId = Schedule.InstanceId AND Appointment.FacultyId = Schedule.FacultyId AND Appointment.CollegeId = Schedule.CollegeId AND Appointment.CourseId = Schedule.CourseId AND Appointment.CoursePartId = Schedule.CoursePartId AND Appointment.SubjectId = Schedule.SubjectId AND Schedule.SubjectCategoryId = 2 WHERE (Appointment.InstanceId = @InstanceId) AND (Appointment.FacultyId IN (@FacultyId)) AND (Appointment.CollegeId IN (@CollegeId)) AND (Appointment.CourseId IN (@CourseId)) AND (Appointment.CoursePartId IN (@CoursePartId)) AND (Appointment.SubjectId IN (@SubjectId)) AND (Appointment.IsPaperSetter = 1) AND (Appointment.SubjectCategoryId = 2) AND (Appointment.IsInternal <> @OnlyInternal) ORDER BY Appointment.IsChairman DESC

data.name: textBox19.Value
data.value: = "I am directed to appoint you as Paper Setter and / or Examiner in the subject (s) given below for theory at " + Fields.CourseName + " - " + Fields.CoursePartName + IIF(Fields.CollegeId = 28, " ( " + Fields.CollegeName + " ) ", "") + " - Examination " + Fields.InstanceName

data.name: htmlTextBox1.Value
data.value:
This invitation is issued on the assumptions printed overleaf.

External  Examiner (s) only:   I would   further  like to  request  the  favour  of  an  immediate  confirmation  of   your acceptance in the enclosed formats to the undersigned and the Chairman separately.

The  Internal  and External Examiners should  report  in  {Fields.LetterAddress}  at 10.30 am for the said meeting. Chairman is requested to coordinate with the other Papersetters in the matter as a whole.

In case the External paper setter is unable to  attend  the  meeting  of  paper  setting,  the  Chairman  should  get  the manuscripts of  the  question paper (s) from him \ her, well in advance, prior  to  the date of  the  meeting of the paper setting in a sealed envelope which can be finalized in the meeting. The External Examiner, if required, may contact the Chairman of the subject for  a copy of the syllabus and specimen copy of  the question  paper. On request from the External Examiner, the Chairman  is requested to provide the same to the External Examiner accordingly.

The Director, Central Assessment Proggramme, may invite you for the assessment of answer books, if required. You are requested to co-operate the CAP Director.

Please note that Car travel expenses will not be allowed for Papersetting.  However, the actual expenses towards Bus / Rail travel will be reimbursed by transfer of money on producing the tickets.  For transfer of money, you are requested to give your bank details in the enclosed form and submit it alongwith your remuneration / travel bills.

data.name: textBox17.Value
data.value: = IIF(Fields.DesignationName = "", "", Fields.DesignationName + ", ") + Fields.DepartmentName + " " + IIF(Fields.Address1 = Null or CStr(Fields.Address1) = "", Fields.CollegeAddress, Fields.Address1) + ", Mob.: " + Fields.Mobile1

data.name: sdsColleges.SelectCommand
data.value: SELECT DISTINCT College.Id, College.Name, CollegeCourseDetail.FacultyId FROM CollegeCourseDetail LEFT OUTER JOIN College ON CollegeCourseDetail.CollegeId = College.Id WHERE (CollegeCourseDetail.FacultyId IN (@FacultyId))

data.name: sdsCourses.SelectCommand
data.value: SELECT DISTINCT Course.Id, Course.Name, CollegeCourseDetail.CollegeId FROM CollegeCourseDetail LEFT OUTER JOIN Course ON CollegeCourseDetail.CourseId = Course.Id WHERE (CollegeCourseDetail.CollegeId IN (@CollegeId))

data.name: sdsSubjects.SelectCommand
data.value: SELECT DISTINCT Subject.Id, Subject.Name, Subject.CoursePartId FROM Subject INNER JOIN SubjectCategoryDetail ON Subject.Id = SubjectCategoryDetail.SubjectId WHERE (Subject.CoursePartId IN (@CoursePartId)) AND (SubjectCategoryDetail.CategoryId IN (2, 10, 48)) AND (Subject.Status = 'Active')

data.name: htmlTextBox2.Value
data.value:
INSTRUCTIONS TO PAPER SETTERS

Your appointment is made on the following assumptions:

  1. That none of you have any relative appearing in any subjects at this examination of the University.
  2. That none of you have coached any student/s privately / or engaged in taking any private tuitions of student/s for this examination of the University.
  3. That none of you have written any books as guides, annotations, digests or catechism or any book of solved examples for students with reference to this examination of the University.

Controller of Examinations
